## RepeatOptions interface

Options for configuring repeat behavior.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RepeatOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [positioning](./fast-element.repeatoptions.positioning.md) | boolean | Enables index, length, and dependent positioning updates in item templates. |
|  [recycle](./fast-element.repeatoptions.recycle.md) | boolean | Enables view recycling |
